title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Uniswap (UNI) Drops 6.8% as Index Declines
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Aptos (APT) joined Uniswap (UNI) as an underperformer, falling 4.6% from Tuesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3335.09, down 1.0% (-34.87) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

One of 20 assets is trading higher.

Leaders: XRP (+0.9%) and AVAX (-0.1%).

Laggards: UNI (-6.8%) and APT (-4.6%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index declined 1.0% with most assets trading lower, led by significant drops in UNI (-6.8%) and APT (-4.6%).
